Reference

All functions

all_ages()

Age X Size models

is_conv_to_asymptotic()

Check for model convergence to asymptotic dynamics

define_impl() make_impl_args_list() define_domains() define_pop_state() define_env_state()

Helpers for IPM construction

right_ev() left_ev()

Compute the standardized left and right eigenvectors via iteration

truncated_distributions()

Eviction correction

format_mega_matrix()

Format a mega-matrix

gen_di_det_ex

A general deterministic IPM example

init_ipm()

Initialize an IPM

define_kernel() define_k() remove_k()

Functions to initialize and define IPM kernels

lambda()

Compute the per-capita growth rate for an IPM object

make_ipm()

Methods to implement an IPM

`%^%` mat_power()

Raise a matrix to a power

plot(<ipmr_matrix>) plot(<simple_di_det_ipm>) plot(<simple_di_stoch_param_ipm>) plot(<simple_di_stoch_kern_ipm>) plot(<general_di_det_ipm>)

Plot a matrix or an *_ipm object

use_vr_model()

Predict methods in ipmr

print(<proto_ipm>) print(<simple_di_det_ipm>) print(<simple_di_stoch_kern_ipm>) print(<simple_di_stoch_param_ipm>) print(<general_di_det_ipm>) print(<general_di_stoch_kern_ipm>) print(<general_di_stoch_param_ipm>)

Print proto_ipms or *_ipm objects

iceplant_ex

Raw demographic data to construct an example IPM

right_mult()

Right multiplication

sim_di_det_ex

Simple deterministic IPM example

vec() inv_vec()

Perform the vec operation and it's inverse
